name: Figma Introduction : Tips and Tricks
description:
Welcome to my Figma introduction: Tips and Tricks presentation! I hope to show you a good overview of Figma, its workspace, and some neat tips and tricks I picked up along the way in my design journey. Hope this helps and feel free to please follow along as I present it at the uxuw club event! See you there!


Here is the link to the event recording and the time my presentations starts within the event:

https://youtu.be/JjOgn3KdJyg?t=556


Some updates to the slides have been made for clarity but not much should be different from now to the presentation. Hope this is helpful to those who want to quick go-to for expediting your Figma prowess!
